messages.content: hot to replace grub loader with efi and remove linux on windows dual boot pc?

The easiest way to remove Linux is to completely remove the Linux boot loader with rEFInd. This can be done via the rEFInd installation program or by editing the EFI boot file directly.

Note that if you remove the Linux boot loader using either of these methods, you may no longer be able to boot Linux. You will need to boot from another installation medium, such as a live USB, live CD, or DVD, and then use a live Linux system to restore the Linux boot loader.
how do i edit efi boot file?
The easiest way to edit the EFI boot file is with the rEFInd installation program. You can also do this manually by following the steps in this section.
